Name: The auditory brainstem response to speech is not affected by selective attention
Acknowledgements: We thank Yathida Melody Anankul, Ashlynne G Xavier, Tiffany Waddington, and Susan A McLaughlin for assistance with data collection. We are grateful to Tobias Reichenbach and colleagues for freely sharing experimental data and stimuli, and to Skyler G Jennings for teaching us how to make and use the eardrum electrodes.
HowToAcknowledge: If you reference this dataset in a publication, please cite the paper Stoll et. al, The auditory brainstem response to speech is not affected by selective attention. PLOS Bio, 2025.
